item.title: Raised Pavement Closed, 17th April
item.description:
The raised pavement alongside Idsall House wall has been closed for over two weeks with no reason! No obstruction, other that the signage and barriers themselves, and no activity of any kind. My CBC councillor or Parish Council have no idea why the barriers & path closure exists. Please explain or remove because villagers are already ignoring them!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 32;34, High Street, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
